comments: Great teacher. This was my only animal science class but it gave me a very good overview of topics that came into play in my classes for environmental science and zoology.

The class and the topics it covers are very interesting. There is no textbook -- the lecture notes ARE the textbook -- so don\'t skip. Recitations can be boring, but some of the videos are good. Working as a group on the paper was awful. Overall I learned a lot in this course and would recommend it to anyone interested in animals.
